articles.title: Samuel Durrance, astronaut who flew with telescope he built, dies at 79 - collectSPACE.com
articles.description: Samuel Durrance, who as an astronomer was one of the first non-career astronauts to fly with NASA after the loss of space shuttle Challenger, has died at 79. Durrance flew twice in space, each time accompanying the Astro payload he helped to design and build.
